message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $100 for it.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can do $130 for the product, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $130 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $110 for the product.
I'm not willing to go as low as $110, Bob. I can meet you in the middle at $125.
I'm still a bit short on budget, Alice. I'd be willing to pay $115 for the product.
I'm not willing to go below $130, Bob. I can offer you a slight discount at $127.50, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I'm still trying to stay within my budget, Alice. I'd be willing to pay $120 for the product.
